name: Hotel Website Wireframe Design
description:
1. Modern, Clean & Minimalist
  2. Dedicated Room & Property Page
  3. Amazing Booking System
  4. User Management
  5. Host, Guest & Owner Module
  6. Easy Search Filter
  7. Payment Module
  8. Registration System


This wireframe is a clean and minimalist website designed for hotels, chalets, bed and breakfasts, resorts, apartments and all tourism-related businesses. Hotel rooms have a dedicated page where the hotel owner can show all accommodation details with an amazing booking system. The hotel theme include also an easy search filter system for showing all rooms and you can book them with a multiplies steps reservation module.
